long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A writing prompt generator that's available anywhere. Powered by flash fiction and writing tool platform The Story Shack, this lightweight application will provide you with thousands of on-the-fly writing ideas. Use it before starting any new writing sessions in your favorite browser-based text editor!
